sec.div: 2.8. Effect of the Interventions on Organs Weights
sec.p: Liver and kidney weights and relative weights were significantly increased in the H 2O 2 treated group, while brain weight and relative brain weight were significantly decreased ( Table 5). The same results were encountered in the group received H 2O 2 with Argan oil. However, in the group received H 2O 2 with Argan oil with Syzygium aromaticum essential oil, there was no changes in the kidney weight and relative kidney weight.
